issues.title: [Wiki Maintainer] Create redirects for renamed paths
issues.body:
Because several files and the `_guide` directory will be renamed, existing external links may break. Add redirect entries (e.g., in `netlify.toml`, `vercel.json`, or your static site router) for the following old â†’ new paths:

- `_guide/` â†’ `guide/`
- `_guide/customization.md` â†’ `guide/theme-customization.md`

This ensures that users and search engines are seamlessly forwarded to the new URLs.

---

issues.title: [Wiki Maintainer] Set proper publication status for guide documents
issues.body:
Five documents under the `_guide` (to be renamed `guide`) directory have `status: "unknown"`. Decide whether each should be `published` or remain `draft` and update the metadata accordingly.

- `configuration.md`
- `customization.md` (will become `theme-customization.md`)
- `getting-started.md`
- `faq.md`
- `llm-workflow.md`

After updating, run the build process to verify that the status changes are reflected in the generated site.

---
*ğŸ¤– ì´ IssueëŠ” Wiki Tree Maintainerì— ì˜í•´ ìë™ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.*

issues.title: [Wiki Maintainer] Add a home page (home.md) at the repository root
issues.body:
The wiki currently lacks a landing page. Create `home.md` (or rename an existing introductory document) and place it at the repository root. This file will serve as the default entry point for all visitors.

- Ensure the file contains a brief overview and navigation links to the main categories (`about`, `bun`, `guide`).
- Add a redirect from the old root URL (if any) to the new `home.md`.

---
*ğŸ¤– ì´ IssueëŠ” Wiki Tree Maintainerì— ì˜í•´ ìë™ ìƒì„±ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.*

issues.body:
Two documents are currently in **draft** status:

- `bun/overview.md`
- `bun/ci/github-actions.md`

Decide whether they should be published (change status to *published*) or remain drafts. If they stay drafts, consider moving them to a dedicated `drafts/` folder to keep the public tree clean.
